string.name: GatherTypeMissmatch
string.value: You must equip a proper tool to harvest this resource.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can gain more Fullness from the same food.

string.name: h
string.value: Fullness recovery items recover #recoverySatietyR% more Fullness.

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases your max Fullness. It does not increase your stomach size.

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases your max Acting Power.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases your max HP. \r\n\r\n #c* Required Trait: Max Acting Power Increase Level 10 or higher

string.name: desc
string.value: Reduces the Heat Wave and Squall's effect on your Fullness and Acting Power.

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants you a Protective Shield when your HP is 10% or lower.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases your Speed when your Acting Power is 30% or lower. \r\n\r\n #c* Required Trait: Max HP Increase Level 10 or higher

string.name: desc
string.value:
Allows you to make potions that recover both Acting Power and HP. 
 - Level 1: Acting Power Recovery Potion (XL) recipe added 
 - Level 2: HP Recovery Potion (XL) recipe added 

 #c* Required Trait: Efficient Diet Level 10 or higher

string.name: desc
string.value:
Emergency food that tastes bad but has a long shelf life is provided in your supplies. 
 - Stage 1: Energy Bar x1 given 
 - Stage 2: Energy Bar x2 given 
 - Stage 3: Canned Food x2 given

 #c* Required Trait: Field Bishop Level 2 or higher, Survival Architect Level 1 or higher

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants a chance to obtain more resources when harvesting.

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants a chance to find additional loot when defeating enemies.

string.name: desc
string.value: Reduces the amount of logs used in production.

string.name: desc
string.value: Reduces the amount of stones used in production.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Allows you to make a bigger storage room, a longer-lasting bonfire, and more durable stone walls. 
 - Level 1: Improved Storage Room recipe added 
 - Level 2: Improved Bonfire recipe added 
 Level 3: Sturdy Advanced Stone Wall recipe added

 #c* Required Trait: Clever Harvesting Level 10 or higher

string.name: desc
string.value:
You can make potions that repair durability of a weapon or a tool. 
 - Level 1: Whetstone recipe added

 #c* Required Trait: Master of Harvesting Level 15 or higher

string.name: desc
string.value:
A Survival Worktable given as part of your supplies. 
 - Level 1: Survival Worktable given upon entry

 #c* Required Trait: Survival Architect Level 3 or higher, Innate Talent Level 10 or higher

string.name: desc
string.value: Improves Acting Power recovery potion's absorption to increase the recovery amount.

string.name: h
string.value: Acting Power Recovery Items recover #recoveryStaminaR% more Acting Power.

string.name: desc
string.value: You have a chance to recover HP when you inflict damage to enemies.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Basic Attack Power. \r\n\r\n #c* Required Trait: Swift Hands Level 3 or higher

string.name: desc
string.value:
You can make a further improved Attack Power potions. 
 - Stage 1: Attack Power Explosion Potion recipe added

 #c* Required Trait: Appropriate Potion Consumption Level 10 or higher

string.name: desc
string.value:
A useful weapon given as part of your supplies. 
 - Level 1: Special Iron Sword given upon entry

 #c* Required Trait: High Quality Attack Power Potion Level 1 or higher, Danger Escape Level 5 or higher

string.name: desc
string.value: Blessed by the energy of sturdy earth, HP increases.

string.name: h
string.value: Max Life Force is increased by {maxHP:g}

string.name: desc
string.value: Blessed by the energy of seething earth, Attack Power increases.

string.name: desc
string.value: Blessed by the abundance of the earth, Fullness increases.

string.name: desc
string.value: You are extremely hungry! Your Acting Power continues to drain.

string.name: desc
string.value: You ran out of Acting Power! Your Speed and Jump are lowered, and your attacks and harvesting are less effective.

string.name: desc
string.value: You are full and feeling strong. You continuously recover HP over time.

string.name: desc
string.value: The bright light helps you get over the fear, increasing Attack Power and Defense.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sudden shower falls upon the island. The harsh weather makes you use more Acting Power.

string.name: desc
string.value: A heat wave emerges. You feel tired faster, and you feel more hungry.

string.name: desc
string.value: A thick fog blankets the surroundings, making it harder to see.

string.name: desc
string.value: A nice breeze surrounds you. You use less Acting Power and Fullness drains more slowly.

string.name: desc
string.value: There is no way to swim safely in the pitch-black darkness!\r\n\r\nLife Force and Acting Power drain quickly.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can fly with this pair of Magic Wings. \r\n#c - Enables the Flying Skill\r\n - Max Mount Duration: 180 seconds

string.name: desc
string.value: You can fly through the air quickly aboard this airplane. \r\n#c - Enables the Flying Skill\r\n - Max Mount Duration: 300 seconds

string.name: desc
string.value: Blessed by the sturdy earth, HP increases.

string.name: desc
string.value: Blessed by the seething earth, Attack Power increases.

string.name: desc
string.value: Blessed by the abundant earth, Fullness increases.

string.name: desc
string.value: You'll start with a higher Attack Power.

string.name: h
string.value: When you start, Attack Power is increased by {attackPowerRate:g}%

string.name: desc
string.value: Can be placed by further enhancing the Attack Power of the tower to be installed.

string.name: h
string.value: When you start, Attack Power of the tower is increased by {towerAttack:g}%

string.name: desc
string.value: You'll start with a higher Defense.

string.name: h
string.value: When you start, Defense is increased by {defensePower:g}%

string.name: desc
string.value: You'll start with a higher Attack Speed.

string.name: h
string.value: When you start, Attack Speed is increased by {x:g} stage

string.name: h
string.value: Damage dealt at night is increased by {attackPowerNight:g}

string.name: desc
string.value: You'll start with a higher HP.

string.name: h
string.value: When you start, max HP is increased by {maxHP:g}

string.name: h
string.value: When you start, max Fullness is increased by {maxSatiety:g}

string.name: desc
string.value: You'll start with higher Acting Power.

string.name: h
string.value: When you start, max Acting Power is increased by {maxStamina:g}

string.name: h
string.value: When you start, Speed is increased by {speed:g}

string.name: h
string.value: When you start, Jump is increased by {jump:g}

string.name: desc
string.value: Harvesting tool and survival worktable are provided as supplies upon entry.

string.name: h
string.value: - Stage 1: <Stone Axe, Stone Pickax> are given \r\n- Stage 2: <Survival Worktable, Stone Axe, Stone Pickax> are given \r\n- Stage 3: <Industrial Worktable, Steel Axe, Steel Pickax> are given

string.name: desc
string.value: Emergency food that tastes bad but has a long shelf life is provided as a supply upon entry.

string.name: h
string.value: - Level 1: <Energy Bar x1, Hardtack x1> are given \r\n - Level 2: <Energy Bar x1, Hardtack x1, Canned Food x1> are given \r\n - Level 3: <Energy Bar x1, Hardtack x1, Canned Food x1, Chocolate x1> are given

string.name: desc
string.value: When entering, you'll start with a pretty useful weapon equipped.

string.name: h
string.value: - Level 1: <Wooden Sword> is equipped as default \r\n- Level 2: <Iron Sword> is equipped as default \r\n- Level 3: <Golden Sword> is equipped as default

string.name: desc
string.value: When entering, you'll start with armor equipped that can protect your body.

string.name: h
string.value: - Level 1: <Leather Armor, Sandals> are equipped as default \r\n- Level 2: <Gladiator Armor, Sloppy Leather Shoes> are equipped as default \r\n- Level 3: <Plate Armor, Studded Shoes, Leather Hat> are equipped as default

string.name: desc
string.value: When entering, you will be given building facilities necessary for exploration.

string.name: h
string.value: - Level 1: <Bonfire x1> is given \r\n - Level 2: <Bonfire x1, Palm Tent x1> are given \r\n - Level 3: <Bonfire x1, Palm Tent x1, Wooden Box x1> are given

string.name: desc
string.value: Harvesting power of harvesting Tool is increased.

string.name: h
string.value: Harvesting Tool's resource harvesting power is increased by {gatherPowerRate:g}%

string.name: desc
string.value: Not affected by the penalty of Fullness and Acting Power due to heat and shower.

string.name: NotEnoughSpace
string.value: There is not enough space to install. Please try again elsewhere.

string.name: UnabletoPlace
string.value: You cannot install underwater. Please try again elsewhere.

string.name: BagInBagForbidden
string.value: You cannot put bags inside another bag.

string.name: PlacementReqNotMet
string.value: The facility cannot be installed in this location. Please try again in the designated location.

string.name: Challenge_Not_Open
string.value: You can proceed with this mission after the challenge mode is activated.

string.name: Inventory_Full
string.value: You cannot have any more items.

string.name: invenCheck
string.value: There's not enough space in your inventory. Check your inventory and try again.

string.name: NoItemsToRepair
string.value: There is no weapon or tool for repairs.

string.name: doNotThrowBag
string.value: You cannot drop a bag that contains items.

string.name: UnabletoCraft
string.value: The worktable is too far or you don't have enough materials.

string.name: UnabletoCook
string.value: Please try again near a bonfire or a countertop after putting in at least 1 ingredient.

string.name: str
string.value: There are countless rumors and stories tangled in The Misty Island. There's a large ruin in the center. What is the identity of the center ruin that appeared. Let's pursue the whereabouts of the hidden truth and uncover the truth that has come to the island.

string.name: str
string.value: Goblins and Lizardmen swarm to claim the Lava Stone. Their greed has brought upon an anomaly on the island. Why are they trying to conquer Lava Stone so much? We need to find a way to solve this situation as soon as possible.

string.name: str
string.value: There is only one way to protect the island. It's no longer possible to avoid a head-on confrontation with the Goblins. We must stop them before they go into a state of frenzy. What is the final battle the expedition will face, and the fate of The Misty Island...?

string.name: str
string.value: Protecting the ruins was successful, but it is said that the Misty Island is still surrounded in mystery. Let's clean up the remaining remnants and investigate the island. Thus, our exploration will continue...
